content: Yes! Pinterest also allows users to save links to articles, websites, and blog posts to their boards. All you need to do is paste the link into a pin, add a title, description, and relevant image to make it more eye-catching. This feature works great for saving and organizing articles and resources that you may want to revisit later or share with others. Plus, it can help you create a comprehensive board that covers all aspects of a particular topic. So, yes, you can absolutely save links to articles and websites on Pinterest.
